about.title: About ChatScale
about.subtitle: Our mission is to transform businesses through intelligent AI chatbots

hero.title: We're on a mission to revolutionize customer interactions
hero.description: Founded in 2020, ChatScale has been at the forefront of conversational AI technology, helping businesses of all sizes transform their customer engagement strategies.

sections.title: Our Story
sections.content: ChatScale was founded by a team of AI researchers and customer experience experts who saw the potential for conversational AI to transform how businesses interact with their customers. What started as a small project has grown into a comprehensive platform serving over 100 businesses worldwide.

sections.title: Our Values
sections.content: We believe in creating technology that enhances human connections rather than replacing them. Our AI solutions are designed to handle routine tasks so your team can focus on what matters most: building meaningful relationships with your customers.

sections.title: Our Team
sections.content: Our diverse team brings together expertise in artificial intelligence, natural language processing, customer experience, and business strategy. We're united by our passion for creating technology that makes a real difference for businesses and their customers.
